All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AccountDAO
Data Access Object interface for managing account-related operations.
AccountDAOImpl
Implementation of the AccountDAO interface, providing methods for managing account-related operations.
AccountInterfaceRunnable
A Runnable implementation for account management operations.
AccountManager
Interface for managing user accounts.
AccountService
Service class for managing user accounts.
AmountReaderInput
Class for reading amount from console input.
AppTest
Unit test for simple App.
ATMApplication
Main class for running the ATM application.
ConsoleUserInterface
Console user interface class for interacting with the application through the console.
ConsoleUserInterfaceRunnable
A Runnable implementation for managing console user interface operations.
DAOException
Exception throws when an error occurs in DAO operations.
DBConnection
Class for establishing a database connection.
PinCodeEncryptor
Class for hashing PIN codes.
ReaderInput
Class for reading user input from the console.
Transaction
Represents a transaction between two parties.
TransactionDAO
Data Access Object interface for managing transaction-related operations.
TransactionDAOImpl
Implementation of the TransactionDAO interface, providing methods for managing transaction-related operations.
TransactionManager
Interface for managing transactions
TransactionMapper
Utility class responsible for mapping database result sets to Transaction objects.
TransactionService
Implementation of the TransactionManager interface, providing services for managing transactions.
User
Represents a user account in the system.
UserDAO
Data Access Object interface for managing user-related operations.
UserDAOImpl
Implementation of the UserDAO interface, providing methods for managing user-related operations.
UserInterfaceRunnable
 
UserManager
interface for managing user accounts.
UserMapper
Utility class responsible for mapping database result sets to User objects.
UserService
Implementation of the UserManager interface, providing services for managing user accounts.
